summary: A conversion of the Seraphine Armor by jmenaru / BloodFree for SeveNBase Bombshell,Cleavage and Natural body with working weightslider.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#FF4080]Install [url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24723]Seraphine Armor UNP[/url] first then overwrite the files![/color][/b]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/u3popun.png[/IMG]
Seraphine Armor converted for SeveNBase Bombshell , Cleavage and Natural body with working weightslider and BBP. Don't forget to get the original mod first, this conversion has only 7B armor meshes.


[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oQhwEBV.png[/IMG]
[url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24723]Seraphine Armor UNP[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36992/?]Any SeveNBase body.[/url]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hyKTPfg.png[/IMG]

Use Nexus Mod Manager

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eV272UF.png[/IMG]
jmenaru / BloodFree for Seraphine Armor
Sevennity for SevenBase Bombshell and logo
Crosscrusade
DemonHunter1986
Wast1980
author: Shockero
